description.title: The GNU C Compiler
description.paragraph: This package is specific to Version 3 of the GNU Compiler Collection; it provides the MinGW implementation of the GNU C language compiler; this includes the C preprocessor, and the common back end processors which are necessary to support all other language compilers in the GNU Compiler Collection.
This is a required component of the MinGW Compiler Suite, for those users who continue the use GCC Version 3.

description.title: The GNU Ada Compiler
description.paragraph: This package provides the MinGW implementation of the GNU Ada language compiler for GCC Version 3.

description.title: The GNU C++ Compiler
description.paragraph: This package provides the MinGW implementation of the GNU C++ language compiler for GCC Version 3.

description.title: The GNU FORTRAN Compiler
description.paragraph: This package provides the MinGW implementation of the GNU FORTRAN language compiler for GCC Version 3.

description.title: The GNU Java Compiler
description.paragraph: This package provides the MinGW implementation of the GNU Java language compiler for GCC Version 3.

description.title: The GNU Objective-C Compiler
description.paragraph: This package provides the MinGW implementation of the GNU Objective-C language compiler for GCC Version 3.
